definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ne 9:4, but rd. perh. [[בִּנּוּי]] cf. BeRy & vid. Ne 10:10, Ne 12:8, Ezr 8:33;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[בּוּנִּי]] ([[בֶּן]]) Ne 11:15, but rd. perh. [[מִן בְּנֵי]] etc. cf. BeRy.
a chief of people Ne 10:16, perh. repetit. of [[בָּנִי]] v:Ne 10:15 cf. BeRy.
